effect.spirit-walker.spirit_walk.desc: Temporarily removes you from your body
text.config.spirit-walker.title: Spirit Walker Config
text.config.spirit-walker.option.enableD: Enables the default recipe for the potion.
Disable this if you want to use your own.
text.config.spirit-walker.option.normalP: The length of the normal potion, in seconds
text.config.spirit-walker.option.strongP: The length of the strong potion, in seconds
text.config.spirit-walker.option.longPot: The length of the long potion, in seconds
text.config.spirit-walker.option.listenF: Sounds will be heard from the body, not the camera
